item.title: What President Buhari Discussed With Security Chiefs In Aso Rock
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari on Thursday met with the various heads of Nigeria’s security agencies over rising cases of banditry and kidnappings. Naija News reports that the meeting was held at the Presidential Villa in Abuja. Speaking to State House correspondents after the meeting, the National Security Adviser (NSA), Major General Babagana Monguno (rtd) stated that Buhari vowed not to exit the government as a failure in 2023. He disclosed that security chiefs briefed the president on the success recorded so far against insecurity.

item.title: Blossom Chukwujekwu Ex-Wife, Maureen Shares Romantic Moment With New 'Husband' (Video)
item.description: Maureen Esisi, the ex-wife of Nollywood actor, Blossom Chukwujekwu, has got many tongues wagging with a video of her and reality TV star, Prince who she referred to as her husband. Naija News reports that this is coming a few weeks after Maureen sparked marriage speculations after flaunting a gigantic engagement ring. The fashion designer took to her Instagram page to share a lovey-dovey video of herself and Prince at a nightclub.

item.title: jpowwwww - Age, Family, Bio
Julie London - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Jazz and pop singer who recorded "Cry Me a River" in 1955 and who acted for almost forty years in films like The Wonderful Country. Before Fame She grew up in San Bernadino, but moved to Hollywood when she was fourteen; she began acting soon after her family moved. Trivia She was known for her smoky, husky voice, as well as for her role as a nurse on the medical drama show Emergency!

item.title: Pope Francis Cancels Official Engagements For Second Consecutive Day
item.description: Pope Francis will be working from home on Friday after he cancelled his official engagements for the second day in a row. The Vatican announced that the Pope has postponed his official appointments for Friday and would be working from home. The announcement is coming a day after Naija News reported that the head of the catholic faith also cancelled a scheduled appearance at mass on Thursday because of “a mild ailment”.

item.title: Six Killed As ISWAP Invades Boko Haram Stronghold
item.description: Fighters of the Islamic State In West Africa Province (ISWAP) has at the weekend attacked the enclaves of the Boko Haram, during which six of them were reportedly killed. Naija News reports that the attack is a continuation of their sustained inter-rivalry clash following the decision of the ISIS backed ISWAP faction to pull out of Boko Haram. It was gathered that ISWAP had in a silent operation stormed the home of Boko Haram insurgents in Gajibo, a town 95km northeast of Maiduguri, Borno state capital, and slaughtered six whom they declared as “infidels”.

item.title: "Nawaenjoi tu": Siwezi Kuisaliti Jamii Yangu, Joshua Kutuny Asema
item.description: Naibu katibu wa Jubilee Joshua Kutuny amesema alishauriwa na wazee asiwahi isaliti jamii yakeAmesema kwa sasa yuko Jubilee kwa muda tu na baadaye atachukua mwelekeo mpya kisiasa Hatua yake huenda ikachochea masaibu ambayo yanazunguka chama cha Jubilee huku ikishukiwa wengi wa wafuasi wake ni wandani wa DP na wanasubiri muda tu na kisha kuungana naye kwenye IDAMbunge wa Cherangany Joshua Kutuny ameashiria atajiunga na NAibu Rais William Ruto kwenye chama chake cha UDA wakati bora ukifika.

item.title: Iyabo Ojo Makes Case For Lagos Gubernatorial Candidates Days After Voting For Peter Obi
item.description: Ahead of the Lagos State gubernatorial election, Nollywood actress, Iyabo Ojo has declared she is indecisive about the candidate to vote for in the gubernatorial election. This is coming a few days after the thespian publicly declared support for Labour Party (LP) presidential candidate, Peter Obi during the just concluded elections. Naija News reports that Iyabo Ojo via her Instagram page shared her opinion on the three governorship candidates in Lagos State.

item.title: NAF Bombs ISWAP Chief Responsible For Boko Haram's Shekaus Killing
item.description: The Nigerian Air Force (NAF) on Sunday bombed dozens of Islamic State West Africa Province (ISWAP) terrorists in Lamboa in Kaga Lga of Borno State. It was gathered that the multiple airstrikes conducted by Alpha-Jets, L-39 and MI-35 helicopters hit a notorious terrorist, Modu Sulum, ISWAP Logistics Commander, and several others. Sulum, who took part in the elimination of Boko Haram factional leader, Abubakar Shekau, was responsible for the destruction of power transmission towers at Malanari along Maiduguri-Damaturu Highway and attacks on travellers in Auno and Jakana.

item.title: Nakuru Widower Pleads for Help to Find Daughter Who Has Been Missing for 15 Months
item.description: Bella Martin has been missing since April 12, 2020, when she walked out of her home but never returnedThe 15-year-old had just returned home from school where she had just started as a form one studentAccording to her father, nobody has ever called him to demand a ransomPAY ATTENTION: Help us change more lives, join TUKO.co.ke’s Patreon programme. Since his daughter went missing over a year ago, Martin Shikuku is a restless father who has become accustomed to sleepless nights.

item.title: Why Afenifere Will Support Peter Obi Over Tinubu, Atiku, Kwankwaso, Sowore, Others [Full Text]
item.description: Afenifere leader, Chief Ayo Adebanjo on Monday revealed why the group has thrown its weight behind the Presidential Candidate of the Labour Party (LP), Peter Obi, for the 2023 presidency. Naija News reports that Adebanjo while speaking at a press conference said the group would not support the presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Bola Tinubu, and the flagbearer of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Atiku Abubakar. Read the full text of the media briefing below:

item.title: Fayemi Reveals Ways To End Farmer-herder Crisis In Benue, Others
item.description: The Governor of Ekiti and Presidential hopeful, Kayode Fayemi, has promised to end the farmer-herder crisis in Benue and other states in the North Central region. Fayemi stated that the lingering crisis has led to the killings of innocent citizens in the region and disrupted farming which the region is known for. He, however, promised to end the crisis by being fair to everyone, equitable, offering inclusiveness and giving everyone a sense of belonging if elected the next President in 2023.

item.title: Buhari's Conditions On Twitter Suspension Unreasonable

item.title: Nollywood Star, Chinedu Bernard Slumps And Dies In Church
item.description: The death has occurred of Nollywood actress, Chinedu Bernard who slumped and died in a church in Enugu State. She was fondly referred to as ‘Choco’ by her fans and colleagues in the industry. She was said to be cleaning the Chapel of St. Leo the Great Catholic Church located inside Federal Housing area in Enugu State when she slumped suddenly. Those on ground when she slumped including a priest identified as Rev Fr Uchendu Chukwuma immediately took the actress to the hospital but she was confirmed dead at the hospital.

item.title: Tanzania | Famous Birthdays
item.description: A country in East Africa within the African Great Lakes region. It borders Uganda, Kenya, Mozambique, Malawi, Zambia, Rwanda, Burundi, and the Democratic Republic of the Congo. Mount Kilimanjaro, Africa's highest mountain, is in northeastern Tanzania.  Trivia Swahili is the official language but there are over 120 languages spoken. It is home to the world’s largest volcanic depression, the Ngorongoro Crater. The Great Migration in Tanzania can be seen year round as more than two million animals migrate around the Serengeti National Park.

item.title: White Widow Linked To Abuja Bombing
item.description: World wide terrorist, 'White Widow' Samantha Lewthwaite, has been linked to the huge terror attack which occurred today in Abuja. The huge explosion destroyed forty buses and left a sickening trail of death and destruction as fuel tanks on nearby vehicles also exploded amid the heat of the blast. But while nobody has officially claimed responsibility, security sources, according to reports fear the bombing may have been a revenge attack for the death of Lewthwaite's mentor two weeks ago - al-Shabaab terror chief Makaburi, aka Sheikh Abubakar Shariff Ahmed.

item.title: PDP Swears In Iyorchia Ayu As New National Chairman
item.description: Nigeria’s major opposition party, the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), has sworn in Dr. Iyorchia Ayu as the party’s new National Chairman. Ayu and other members of the new National Working Committee of the PDP were was sworn in on Friday in Abuja at the International Conference Center. The new PDP leaders were also presented certificates of return, Naija News reports. In his acceptance speech, Ayu vowed that his leadership would reposition the party and work towards reclaiming power at the central level in 2023.

item.title: Buhari Lacks Capacity To Solve Nigerias Problems
item.description: Elder statesman Tanko Yakasai has said President Muhammadu lacks the capacity to solve different problems facing the country. In an interview with Nigerian Tribune on Sunday, Yakasai said President Buhari acks the capacity to better the lives of Nigerians and deliver his promises made during the 2019 general elections. Yakasai noted that electing Buhari as president of the country is the greatest mistake made by Nigerians in recent times. The elder statesman added that his opposition to President Buhari would not translate to endorsement for those calling for the balkanization of the country.

item.title: Seven Governorship Aspirants Ask APC To Cancel Ekiti Primary Election
item.description: Seven governorship aspirants under the All Progressives Congress have called on the party to cancel the primary election of the party scheduled for today in Ekiti State. The aspirants, Kayode Mojo, Demola Popoola, Femi Bamisile, Bamidele Faparusi, Dayo Adeyeye, Opeyemi Bamidele and Afolabi Oluwasola on Thursday alleged that the primary election committee is made up of loyalists of the state Governor, Kayode Fayemi. The Governorship aspirants of the ruling party claimed that Fayemi has plans to impose Biodun Oyebanji as the governorship candidate of the party in the forthcoming election.

item.title: FG Takes Over Former Kwara Governor's Mansion
item.description: The Federal Government has taken over a mansion belonging to former Governor of Kwara State, Abdulfatai Ahmed, over an N5 billion debt. The spokesman of the Assets Management Corporation of Nigeria (AMCON), Jude Nwazor, made this known in an interview with Daily Trust on Wednesday. According to the AMCON spokesman, the house seized is located at Abdulrazaq road, GRA, Ilorin, the state capital. Nwazor said that the debt was a personal one by the former governor, Ahmed, who governed the North Central state between 2011 and 2019.

item.title: Bandits Kill Police Officer, Four Others In Fresh Attack In Niger State
item.description: Again, bandit terrorists have killed an officer of the Nigerian Police Force in a Niger State community. item.title: Nigeria Air Blames Covid 19 For Delay In Acquiring Aircraft
item.description: Nigeria Air’s temporary management has revealed the reason they have not taken delivery of any aircraft needed for it’s operations. Capt. Dapo Olumide, the Chief Executive of the airline’s management, while speaking at the headquarters of the Nigerian Civil Aviation Authority after receiving an Air Transport Licence for the airline, explained that it is difficult to acquire the aircrafts because of the effects of Covid 19 on the aviation sector globally.

item.title: The Controversy Around Tinubu's Age, The 2023 Race And Plans For Nigerians
item.description: As President Muhammadu Buhari’s administration ends in less than 17 months, the race for the highest seat in the country has received huge attention from Nigerians. As the general elections draw closer, top politicians have begun to express their intention to take over the seat of power in the next few months. The development has seen the likes of the National Leader of the All Progressives Congress, Bola Ahmed Tinubu, the Governor of Ebonyi State, David Umahi and the former Governor Abia State and Chief Whip of the Senate, Senator Orji Uzor Kalu, inform President Buhari about their intention to run on the platform of the All Progressives Congress (APC).

item.title: 2023: Tinubu Not Afraid Of Jonathan Contesting APC Presidential Primary
item.description: A House of Representatives member, James Faleke, has said presidential hopeful, Bola Tinubu was not afraid of the plan by former President Goodluck Jonathan to contest in the APC Presidential Primary. Naija News earlier reported that the All Progressives Congres (APC) had reportedly granted Jonathan a waiver to contest the party’s presidential primary slated for Sunday, May 29. Reacting to the development, Faleke said he was confident of Tinubu’s victory provided that the primary is conducted in a free and fair manner.

item.title: Meet Ex-Governor Who 'Took' N2.9bn On Eve Of Departure
item.description: Former governor of Niger state, Babangida Aliyu has been asked to refund the N2.9 billion he took from the government treasury on the eve of his departure. item.title: Juventus Star, Cristiano Ronaldo's Second COVID-19 Test Result Is Out
item.description: Portuguese professional footballer who plays as a forward for Serie A club Juventus, Cristiano Ronaldo has recovered from dreaded COVID-19 disease. Ronaldo’s Coronavirus second result was confirmed negative in a statement released by his club on Friday, October 30. “Ronaldo carried out a check with a diagnostic test (swab) for Covid-19. The exam provided a negative result,” the Italian champions noted. “The player has, therefore, recovered after 19 days and is no longer subjected to home isolation.

item.title: Former Makadara MP Benson Mutura elected new Nairobi assembly Speaker
item.description: - At least 99 MCAs out of 122 voted in support of Benson Mutura to replace the former Speaker Beatrice Elachi - The incoming speaker was sworn in shortly after the exercise and promised to discharge his duties in accordance with the law - The low-key exercise had been conducted via video link in line with government COVID-19 guidelines barring physical gatherings Nairobi county assembly has found a new Speaker barely a week after embattled Beatrice Elachi resigned from the hot seat bringing to an end incessant fights with the MCAs.

item.title: New NIPOST CEO, Odeyemi Dares Aggrieved Workers, Resumes Duty Amid Protest
item.description: There was mild drama on Monday at the headquarters of the Nigeria Postal Service (NIPOST), as the newly appointed Chief Executive Officer (CEO), Tola Odeyemi, resumed duty amid opposition. Earlier today, some workers of the service shut down the head office in Abuja, expressing their disagreement with the new CEO’s appointment by President Bola Tinubu. Recall that President Tinubu’s spokesperson, Ajuri Ngelale, announced last week that his principal has sacked Adeyemi Adepoju as CEO/Post Master General of the agency and appointed Odeyemi to replace him.

item.title: Sonko acheka kwa kiburi kuitwa na DCI kutoa ripoti zaidi kuhusu ghasia za 2017
item.description: Aliyekuwa gavana wa Nairobi Mike Sonko ametakiwa kufika mbele ya idara ya Upelelezi, DCI ili kutoa habari zaidi kuhusiana na anachokijua kuhusu ghasia za baada ya uchaguzi wa mwaka wa 2017 Habari Nyingine: Daddy Owen aomba neema zaidi anaposherekea miaka 40 ya kuzaliwa Habari Nyingine: Kijana wa miaka 15 araruliwa vipande na simba akiwa malishoni Sonko alifichua hivi maajuzi kwamba yeye pamoja na Katibu Mkuu Katika Wizara Ya Usalama Karanja Kibicho waliandaa machafuko jijini Nairobi ili ionekane kana kwamba ni wafuasi wa chama cha ODM.

item.title: Sunday Igbohos Wife, Monarchs Arrive In Cotonou Court
item.description: The extradition trial of Yoruba nation agitator, Sunday Adeyemo also known as Sunday Igboho, continued today, Monday. Naija News reports that Ropo, the Germany-based wife of Igboho, has arrived at the Cour De’appal De Cotonou, Benin Republic as the court resumes sitting in the case against the activist. Yoruba monarchs based in Benin Republic as well as other Yoruba Nation supporters are also at the court. The traditional rulers had met on Sunday and resolved to intervene in the matter.

item.title: Nigeria Needs Twitter, All Of Us Would Have Learnt Our Lessons
item.description: The Senate President of Nigeria, Ahmad Lawan has reacted to the decision of the federal government to ban the micro-blogging site, Twitter. The Senate President in his reaction, called for an amicable resolution to the current face-off between the government and the social media platform. Lawan in his submission stated that it has become clear that Nigeria needs Twitter and Twitter needs Nigeria, adding that he believes all parties have learnt their lessons.

item.title: Nurses strike called off, ordered to report to work immediately
item.description: - Nurses have been on strike for 79 days - They called off their industrial action following a court order issued by a Labour Court - Seth Panyako said the union will still continue pursuing their demands even as they report back to work PAY ATTENTION: Don't miss trending Kenyan news. Follow TUKO.co.ke on Twitter! The Kenya National Union of Nurses (KNUN) has at last called off its members strike after 79 days following a court order issued by the Labour Court on Monday, February 22.

item.title: Shehu Sani Reacts After Defeating El-Rufai In Court
item.description: Former lawmaker, Senator Shehu Sani has reacted after a court dismissed the defamation suit against him by the immediate past Governor of Kaduna State, Nasir El-Rufai. The suit which was filed in 2018, was dismissed on Thursday by Justice H.A.L Balogun of the Kaduna State High Court. As earlier reported by Naija News, the former Governor had sought N2 billion in damages over comments credited to the former lawmaker which he said are totally false and injurious to his person in the eyes of the public.

item.title: "I Have Done Six Tests"
item.description: Media personality and vlogger, Toke Makinwa has come to social media to lament about her sickness which has refused to go. The multiple-award-winning radio and TV presenter said she has done up to six tests but she’s still confined to the sickbed. She further raised the alarm that almost everyone she knows is sick, stating that there’s a nasty bug going around. item.title: Remains Of Ibrahim Attahiru, Others Arrive Abuja For Burial
item.description: The remains of the Chief of Army Staff, Lt Gen Ibrahim Attahiru and others who died in a Beachcraft 350 aircraft that crashed at the Kaduna International Airport on Friday have arrived in Abuja. The remains of the military officers were received at the Presidential Wing of the Nnamdi Azikwe International Airport, Abuja about 11am. They were moved to the National Mosque, Abuja and the Protestant Church at the Air Force base, Abuja.

item.title: Magajin Garin Sokoto, Danbaba Is Dead
item.description: The Magajin Garin Sokoto, Alhaji Hassan Danbaba, who is the Head of Sokoto Kingmakers, has died at the age of 50. Naija News gathered that Danbaba slumped around 11:30 am in his hotel in Kaduna and died on his way to the hospital. “Magajin came to Kaduna on Thursday to condole with a former Minister of Defence, Gen. Aliyu Gusau on the death of his brother,” a source told The Nation.

item.title: Seneta wa Kiambu ajipata pabaya baada ya kumpachika mimba mjakazi wake
item.description: - Seneta maarufu wa Jubilee amegonga vichwa vya habari baada ya kubainika kuwa mjakazi wake amemfikisha kortini kutaka pesa za malezi ya mtoto, KSh 75,000 Habari Nyingine : Video ya mwanamke Mkenya akiteswa Lebanon yakasirisha wengi Jarida la TUKO.co.ke limebaini kuwa Winfred Wangui Kimani amemshtaki seneta wa Paul Kimani Wambugu maarufu kama Wamatangi kwa kupuuza shughuli ya malezi ya mwanao mwenye umri wa miaka 10. Wangui ameeleza kuwa seneta huyo ameweza kumpa Ksh 70,000 pekee tangu mtoto huyo alipozaliwa Aprili 23, 2007 na kukataa kulipa KSh 75,000 kila mwezi.

item.title: What Happened to Devon Bostick? 'Diary of a Wimpy Kid' Star Now
item.description: Devon Bostick is known as Rodrick in the 'Diary of a Wimpy Kid' films, but the actor has tackled different roles since. Here's what he's doing now. To a whole generation of movie fans, actor Devon Bostick will always be Rodrick Heffley from the Diary of a Wimpy Kid movies. He appeared in the first three films as Rodrick, the punk rocker and older brother of the main character Greg Heffley.

Kyallo alitangaza Jumamosi, Mei 30, kuwa ilikuwa siku yake ya mwisho kuonekana kwenye runinga hiyo.

item.title: Ex-Anti-graft Agency Boss, Rimingado Dumps APC For PDP
item.description: A former chairman of the anti-corruption agency in Kano State, Barrister Muhyi Magaji Rimingado, has dumped the All Progressives Congress (APC) for the People Democratic Party (PDP). Naija News reports that the suspended Chairman of the Kano State Public Complain and Anti-Corruption Commission made this known in an interview with Kano Focus. Rimingado said he joined the opposition PDP to serve the people and the state, adding that the party is the only viable alternative that can salvage the state from the current political mess.

item.title: Who Is David Dobrik's Assistant Taylor Hudson?
item.description: David Dobrik is one of the biggest personalities on YouTube, but his assistant Taylor Hudson has earned plenty of attention in her own right. The Gist: Taylor Hudson is David Dobrik's assistant, and frequently appears in his videos and videos from his friends. Taylor is also a beauty influencer in her own right with a large following on Instagram. Taylor is responsible for planning many of David's videos, including researching toys and activities to do in LA.

item.title: 10 facts you need to know as Tunde Kelani clocks 68
item.description: Veteran filmmaker Tunde Kelani clocks 68 on Friday, February 26. The filmmaker and director who is known for his deeply rooted films has been celebrated both at home and abroad for his dexterity in handling the cameras. Many actors have taken to the social media to celebrate the man some of them said brought out the best in them. Many of them displayed his photo on their DP. Legit.ng joins the movie and film making industry in celebrating a man of honour.

item.title: 2023: APC Members Attacking Buni Are Moles
item.description: A former Minister of Aviation, Femi Fani-Kayode has described members of the All Progressives Congress (APC) attacking the Chairman of the Caretaker Committee of the party and Governor of Yobe State, Mai Mala Buni, as moles. Naija News reports that the former Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) stalwart made the submission in an interview with Channels Television on Monday. It is understood that some APC members who are mostly youths have accused Buni and the caretaker committee of delaying the party’s National Convention in order to remain in power.

item.title: Mariale Marrero - Edad, Familia, Biografa

item.title: October 8 Horoscope and Zodiac
item.description: Your greatest challenge may well be choosing a career, but fortunately, you have natural abilities that would be well-served in a number of careers. Your desire for justice and to help others may lead you on a path towards law or social work. Likewise, you may feel most comfortable as your own boss, which may lead you on an entrepreneurial path. If creative expression is more alluring, you may find the entertainment world to be a good fit, such was the case with Matt Damon, who was also born on October 8th.

item.title: Report Reveals Why There Is Less Investment In Power Sector
item.description: Many factors have been identified to be causing poor investment in the Nigerian and African power sectors. Nigeria’s national electricity grid collapsed no fewer than seven times this year alone. The country’s power sector has been labelled as inconsistent as citizens have been thrown into thicker darkness in many parts of the country this year. Sahara Group, a global energy player in power generation and distribution, revealed in its recent reports that the African nations suffer less willingness to invest in the power sector because of revenue losses, inadequate regulations, and lack of trust, among other concerns in the industry.

item.title: Solskjaer Reacts To His Contract Termination
item.description: Norwegian professional football manager, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer, has reacted to his contract termination at Manchester United. Naija News reports that the 48-year-old football coach was relieved of his managerial position at United on Sunday. Solskjaer’s dismissal from Old Trafford follows the club’s 4-1 defeat to bottom table Watford FC. The defeat added to United’s humiliating losses in recent weeks to rivals Liverpool and Manchester City. Speaking in an emotional interview after he was fired from the club, the Norwegian said he hopes to have left United in a better state than he inherited the club three years ago.

Atewologun Laolu-Ogunniyi, popularly known as Skuki Peeshaun, a relationship coach, emphasizes the profound impact that thoughtful goodnight messages can have on maintaining and nurturing relationships.

item.title: Senate Orders NIMASA DGs Arrest Over $9.305bn Loss
item.description: The 9th Senate has ordered the arrest of Dr Bashir Jamoh, Director-General of the Nigerian Maritime and Safety Agency, for allegedly paying a law firm $5 million to recover a $9.3bn loss. The order was given by the Senate Committee on Public Accounts led by Senator Matthew Urhogbide. The panel noted that Jamoh paid $5m for the intelligence-based tracking of a global movement of Nigerian hydrocarbon and recovery of loss by the Federal Government of Nigeria for $9.

item.description: This Forgotten 'Flintstones' Theme Park Is Full Of Creepy NostalgiaBy Mustafa GatollariUpdated Nov. 7 2018, 11:19 a.m. ET I used to hate watching The Flintstones when I was a kid, basically because it was a cartoon version of The Honeymooners, and laugh tracks in a cartoon just seemed unnatural. But that doesn't mean I wouldn't leave the TV on in the background while I was playing with my action figures. As a result, I became well acquainted with the show's world and its characters.

item.title: Why Osinbajo Didn't Attend Tinubu's Campaign Flag-off In Plateau
item.description: The reason behind Vice President Yemi Osinbajo’s absence on Tuesday in Jos, Plateau State for the flag-off of the All Progressives Congress (APC) presidential campaigns for 2023 has emerged. Naija News earlier reported that Osinbajo was conspicuously missing at the official kick-off of the presidential campaigns by Asiwaju Bola Tinubu and his running mate, Kashim Shettima. The event which held at the Rwang Pam township stadium in Jos, the Plateau State capital had many APC stalwarts in attendance as a massive crowd stormed the venue to witness the event.

item.title: 'Another Fake News' - FG Responds To Lagos Judicial Panel Report
item.description: The Federal Government has dismissed the report submitted by the Lagos State Judicial Panel of Inquiry on Restitution for Victims of SARS Related Abuses and other matters. Naija News recalls that the report of the panel led by Justice Doris Okuwobi which was submitted to Governor Babajide Sanwo-Olu of Lagos last week, disclosed that not less than eleven people were killed at the Lekki tollgate incident. The report added that at least 48 protesters were either shot dead, injured with bullet wounds, or assaulted by soldiers.

item.description: On Saturday, English Premier League player, Arsenal unveiled its new signee, Declan Rice, accompanied by the hit song “Declan Rice” by Nigerian rapper, Tochukwu Ojogwu popularly known as Odumodublvck. Naija News reports that Arsenal signed Rice from West Ham United in a deal worth a staggering £105 million, making it the club’s highest transfer fee ever paid for a player. item.title: PSG Prioritize Osimhen's Signing In Preparation For Mbappe's Exit
item.description: Nigerian striker, Victor Osimhen is the top transfer target of PSG should in case the club’s talisman, Kylian Mbappe leaves the club this summer. Mbappe has openly stated his desire to leave Paris Saint-Germain on a free transfer when his contract ends in June 2024, but the Ligue 1 giants are hoping to sell him this summer if he chooses not to sign a new contract. The printed edition of La Gazzetta dello Sport from Sunday states that if Mbappe is sold this summer, Osimhen will be PSG’s top priority.

item.title: What Happened to Chef Naomi Pomeroy? She Has Died at 49
item.description: Acclaimed Portland Chef Naomi Pomeroy Presumed Dead at 49 After Tragic AccidentWhat was Naomi Pomeroy's cause of death? By Elissa NoblittPublished July 17 2024, 1:09 p.m. ET Source: getty imagesJames Beard Award winner and notable Portland chef Naomi Pomeroy, who appeared on Top Chef Masters, is presumed dead after a tragic accident that also left her husband, fellow chef Kyle Linden Webster, clinging to life. The incident happened over the weekend of July 13 and was initially reported by local outlet Portland Monthy.

item.title: 2023 Presidency: It's Not A New Thing, We Will Deliver Adamawa For Tinubu
item.description: A former secretary to the government of the federation (SGF), Babachir Lawal has boasted that the presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Bola Tinubu will win the 2023 election. He stated that Tinubu will defeat the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) candidate, Atiku Abubakar even in his home state of Adamawa. Lawal submitted that Tinubu is a good man and wouldn’t have any difficulty winning votes in any part of Nigeria because he has helped so many people in different parts of the country.

item.title: Court Strikes Out Gusau's Impeachment, Restores Him As Zamfara Deputy Governor
item.description: A Federal High Court on Wednesday restored Mahdi Gusau as the deputy governor of Zamfara following his impeachment by the state’s House of Assembly on February 23, 2022, inspite of a subsisting court order. Naija News reports that the impeachment was set aside by Justice Inyang Ekwo, in a judgement. The judge dismissed all the steps and actions taken by the House of Assembly, former Governor Bello Matawalle and the state’s chief judge in the purported impeachment of Gusau during the pendency of the suit in court.

item.title: Kidnapped UniAbuja Staff, Children Regain Freedom
item.description: Six staff of the University of Abuja and their children who were kidnapped by unknown gunmen on Tuesday morning have regained freedom after their abduction. According to Vanguard, the staff were said to be rescued by security operatives in the early hours of Wednesday. However, details of the rescue operation were sketchy, but the report had it that the abductors abandoned the victims and fled after they were confronted with superior firepower.

He argued however that beyond zoning, equity is an important factor in Nigeria’s democracy and zoning can be used to drive equity and justice.

item.title: What Tony Okocha Said As Magnus Abe Returns To APC In Rivers State
item.description: The chairman of the All Progressives Congress (APC) caretaker committee in Rivers State, Tony Okocha has reacted to the decision of Senator Magnus Abe to return to the party. As earlier reported by Naija News, Abe, who was the governorship candidate of the Social Democratic Party (SDP) in the March 18, 2023 governorship elections in River State, returned to the APC on Wednesday, 3rd January 2024. Abe, who left the APC for SDP in the build-up to the 2023 general elections, said he is back with the APC to enhance the good things President Bola Tinubu is doing in the country.

item.title: Why I Stopped Running After Politicians
item.description: Veteran Nollywood actor, Yemi Solade, has asserted that running after Nigerian politicians because of some benefits is not worth it. Naija News reports that the movie star made this known during an interview with Gboha TV. Solade said he used to be among movie practitioners running after politicians but changed his mind due to their deceitful lifestyle. The thespian stressed that all politicians have their profession before their political journey, which is merely a game.

'We Remain Neutral' DHQ Reacts To Collusion Allegations In Fresh Plateau Killings
item.description: The Defence Headquarters (DHQ) said the Nigerian military remains committed to its constitutional role of protecting the lives and property of citizens. In a statement on Thursday in Abuja, the Director of Defence Information, Brigadier Gen Tukur Gusau, stated that the military remains neutral, focused, and professional. Gusau said this while reacting to allegations the attack and killing of about 30 people in Mangu Local Government Area of Plateau State despite the curfew in place occurred because of collaboration by security agencies.

You see, Jake wants to teach you how to become a successful social media star, and all he asks for in return is $19.

item.title: Kenya Yatuma Msaada wa Chakula DRC Congo, India Kufuatia Mlipuko wa Volkano
item.description: - Mlipuko wa kwanza wa volkano nchini DRC ulishuhudiwa Jumamosi, Mei 22 ambao ulisababisha mamia ya wananchi kuhama makwao wakikimbilia usalama wao - Kenya imetuma msaada wa chakula kwa nchi hiyo, imeripotiwa kwamba mamia ya raia walipoteza makazi katika mkasa huo - Serikali ya Kenya pia imetuma msaada wa chakula nchini India kufuatia mgogoro wa kiafya Serikali ya Kenya imetuma msaada wa chakula katika nchi za DRC Congo na India baada ya nchi hizo mbili kukumbwa na mlipuko wa volkano na mgogoro wa kiafya mtawaliwa.

item.title: Nigeria | Famous Birthdays
item.description: A country located on the western coast of Africa. It is the most populated country on the continent. It is a member of the British Commonwealth and is also a member of the African Union. Trivia Its film industry is known as Nollywood and is the world's second-largest movie producer after Bollywood. The majority of the population is either Christian or Muslim. It famous sites include Cross River National Park, Yankari National Park and Zuma Rock.

item.title: There's a 10-Year Age Gap Between the Oldest and Youngest Bayside Actors in 'Saved by the Bell'
item.description: The main cast of high schoolers in the ‘Saved by the Bell’ reboot is very charming and goofy, but how old are they? Are they really in high school? Source: PeacockNow that the Saved by the Bell reboot is back, we’re watching with eyes and hearts wide open. While Season 2 heavily features the original Saved by the Bell cast, which we definitely do not mind, we also get to see more of the new cast playing the current Bayside students.

item.title: 'Our System Failed Us' - DJ Big N Knocks MC Oluomo Over Remarks On Lekki Shootings
item.description: Disco Jockey, Nonso Ajufo better known as DJ Big, has slammed the Chairman of Lagos State Parks and Garages management Committee, Musiliu Akinsanya, popularly known as MC Oluomo, over his comment on the Lekki shooting. Naija News earlier reported that MC Oluomo had on Sunday claimed that nobody was killed during the shooting at the Lekki TollGate on October 20, 2020 He said this during a rally he organized in Lagos in support of the All Progressives Congress (APC) presidential candidate, Bola Tinubu.

item.title: Ali Nuhus biography: age, family, net worth, house, cars, and career
item.description: Ali Nuhu is one of the most successful and famous actors who, through his amazing talent and on-screen charm, has become a top name in both Nollywood and Kannywood. He has appeared in films like The Ghost and the Tout Too, The Millions and Diamonds in the Sky. Who is Ali Nuhu? He is a versatile artist who has built a successful acting career. He is a popular Nigerian actor, producer, director, scriptwriter, and dancer.

item.title: BBA Winner Dillish Wants To Have Family Soon
item.description: Big Brother Africa (BBA) winner Dillish Matthews has confessed that she really wants to get married soon and start having babies. The celebrity, who was rumoured to have relationships with famous singer, songwriter and dancer Flavour, publicly lamented that she was running out of time and needed to find a man, Nigeriafilms reports. Dillish revealed in a recent interview: "As soon as I find myself a hunk, I will start (having babies).

Capricorns | Famous Birthdays
item.description: The 10th of 12 zodiac signs, Capricorn takes its name from the Capricornus constellation. The word Capricornus is Latin for "horned goat," which inspired the sea goat symbol for Capricorn. It is one of the four cardinal signs along with Aries, Cancer and Libra.  Trivia In Hindu, a Capricorn is known as Makara, which translates to "water monster," or "crocodile." Individuals who are Capricorns are known for being hard-working and ambitious. Country singer Kris Kristofferson named his fourth album Jesus Was a Capricorn.

Vida Familiar Su nombre de pila es Carlos Alberto García Villanueva y nació en México. Es el menor de tres hermanos.

item.title: Ex-Senator, Hassan Dumps PDP For APC
item.description: A lawmaker who represented Yobe South Senatorial District in the National Assembly, Senator Mohammed Hassan, has decamped to the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC). Naija News gathered that Hassan, who was a staunch member of the opposition Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), dumped the party on Wednesday in Abuja. Hasaan, also known as Dambu was received into the party by Yobe Governor and Chairman, APC Caretaker Extraordinary Convention Planning Committee, Mai Mala Buni.

item.title: FG Files 24 Fresh Charges Against Kyari, Uncovers Mega Assets
item.description: The Federal Government has filed fresh 24-count charges against the suspended Deputy Commissioner of Police, Abba Kyari. Naija News reports that the Director of Prosecution and Legal Services, Office of the Attorney-General of the Federation, J. Sunday, filed the fresh 24-count charges filed against Kyari on August 30, 2022. It is understood that the fresh charges were filed at the Federal High Court, Abuja, with charge number: FHC/ABJ/CR/408/22. The case has Mohammed Kyari and Ali Kyari as co-defendants, who are the siblings of the former commander of the Intelligence Response Team (IRT).

item.title: Jeanne Tripplehorn - Age, Family, Bio

item.title: Jonathan Daughters Wedding: Roads And Market Trouble
item.description: Wedding of Jonathan’s daughter is causing troubles in Yenagoa metropolis, Bayelsa State as some roads are being closed and it results in heavy traffic. The wedding of Elizabeth Faith Osakwe & Godswill Osim Edward will be held on Saturday and the security involving soldiers and police are already present at the location. Dame Patience Jonathan, wife of the President, has arrived to the state 2 days ago, and Jonathan is expected to arrive today, on Friday.

item.title: Mkutano wa Ikulu: DP Ruto aonekana mpole kando ya Rais Uhuru
item.description: DP Ruto hujulikana kwa kuwa kiongozi mkakamavu ambaye hutumia weledi wake wa kusema kuwachapa mahasimu - Kwenye picha iliyochapishwa na Ikulu mtandaoni, DP alionekana mpole akiwa ameketi kulia mwa Rais Uhuru - Tofauti na picha za mawaziri ambao walihudhuria mkutano huo ambao walikuwa wamechangamka, DP alionekana kuwa mpweke - DP na Rais wamekuwa na tofauti kali na kuweka wazi uhusiano wao baridi Naibu Rais William Ruto hujulikana kama kiongozi shupavu na ukakamavu wake umekuwa kivutia kwa wengi.

item.title: Nigerians To Pay More For Bread, Biscuit As Bakers Announce 30% Increase
item.description: The Association of Master Bakers and Caterers of Nigeria (AMBCN) has instructed its members to increase the price of bread, biscuits, and other items by 30 percent. Explaining the reason for the price increase, the association of master bakers said the increase in prices of costs of production including sugar, butter, yeast, and flour as well as worsening economic situations in the country is responsible for the directive. The association in a statement by its National President, Mansur Umar at the end of its National Executive Council (NEC) meeting in Abuja.

item.title: Nimeona Canaan pia, Rais Uhuru asema wakati wa hotuba bungeni
item.description: - Rais alisema kwa sasa yeye ni kama Musa na tayari ameona nchi ambayo wana wa Israeli walikuwa wameahidiwa - Alisema nchi hiyo ya asali na maziwa ndipo Kenya inaelekea na itafika kupitia BBI - Simulizi la Rais lilionekana sawia na mbwembwe za kinara wa ODM Raila Odinga kuhusu Canaan Rais Uhuru Kenyatta Alhamisi Novemba 12 alizua kicheko kutoka kwa wabunge baada ya kusema ameona Canaan pia. Kwenye hotuba yake, Rais Uhuru alisema yeye ni kama Musa kwenye Biblia ambaye alisemama katika Mlima Nebo na kuona nchi ya asali na maziwa ambapo wana wa Israeli walikuwa wakielekea.

item.title: Peter Obis Supporter, Flag Boy Attacked In Lagos, Narrates Ordeal
item.description: A supporter of the presidential candidate of the Labor party, (LP) Peter Obi known by his social media username, @ObiFlagboy, has narrated how he was brutally attacked by thugs at the Oshodi area of Lagos State. In the video sighted, the flag boy, who looks bruised and known for moving to various locations in Lagos to display the #ObiDatti flag, narrated how he was chased at Oshodi by thugs suspected to be loyal to other candidates, who assaulted him and his cameraman.

item.title: President Buhari Summons Emergency Security Meeting
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has scheduled an emergency security meeting with the heads of the nation’s security outfits to discuss growing security concerns in the country. The meeting is scheduled to hold on Monday, 31st October, at the presidential villa in Abuja, Naija News reports. This development was confirmed in a statement on Sunday by the senior special assistant to the President on media and publicity, Garba Shehu. To accommodate the emergency meeting, the President has postponed the planned commissioning of the National Agency for Science and Engineering Infrastructure (NASENI) new Technology and Innovation Complex earlier scheduled for tomorrow.

item.title: Rudy Tomjanovich - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: 5-time NBA All-Star forward who played for the San Diego and Houston Rockets from 1970 to 1981. He won back-to-back Championships as head coach of the Houston Rockets in 1994 and 1995. Before Fame He played for the Michigan Wolverines before being selected as the second overall pick by the San Diego Rockets in 1970. Trivia He served as head coach of the Los Angeles Lakers during the 2004-05 season, then became a scout for the team.

item.title: Vacationer's Revenge on Guests Reserving Chairs With Towels
item.description: A Vacationer Got Revenge on Hotel Guests Who Called Dibs on Unattended Chairs With TowelsBy Haylee ThorsonPublished May 19 2023, 3:42 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesIf only Lexie's apartment complex had a pool that looked this luxurious... Everyone who has ever been on a beach vacation knows the pain of finding an empty lounge chair. No matter what time of day you arrive, seemingly every chair is taken by a towel someone threw down to stake their claim.

item.title: Vincent van Gogh - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Dutch artist whose work became known for its emotional intensity and bold use of color years after his death. He is also known for his landscapes and his Olive Trees series that featured depictions of cypresses in different settings. Before Fame He drew pictures as a child and did not begin painting until his late 20s, after a broken heart led him to seek isolation and study religion. His first major painting was The Potato Eaters from 1885.

item.title: Who Is Majah Hypes Ex-Girlfriend, Latisha Kirby? Details on His Ex
item.description: Majah Hype's former girlfriend, Latisha Kirby, made abuse allegations against the social media comedian. He has denied any wrongdoing. Celebrities, even those that are highly active on social media, try to keep some things private, including their relationships. However, sometimes that doesn’t always work out in their favor. In the case of comedian Majah Hype, he may find himself in a bit of legal trouble after a disturbing photo surfaced online.
